boardgame.name: Québec
Québec 1608: 2008
boardgame.description: Qu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;bec puts you at the head of a rich family who wants to leave its name in history by building Qu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;bec city. The game spans four centuries during which you erect the most prestigious buildings and places of the city. Construction is not enough: you also have to ensure your presence in the great spheres of power. It is up to you and your opponents to build Qu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;bec City in your colors!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A game takes place over four centuries. Each player plays on average 5 to 7 turns per century. On each turn, players choose one of these actions :_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Start a new building with his architect_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Complete part of a building_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Send a worker to a zone of influence_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take a leader card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By contributing to the numerous buildings, players acquire influence with the authorities of the time : religion, politics, commerce and culture. Players also help build the famous Citadelle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of each century, there is a scoring round where players get victory points for the workers they managed to send in the 5 zones of influence. Qu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;bec introduces a unique and addictive majority rule. The player with the majority in a zone cascades half of his workers by moving them to the next zone. Workers moved in this way allow a player to score even more points. If a player still has the majority in the next zone, his workers cascade again _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a potentially devastating ripple effect. This mechanism illustrates the interrelationship between the great zones of influence. Players must not only fight to get majorities, they must also erect the most prestigious buildings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends after the fourth century. Players then receive points for the buildings they completed. The player with the most points is declared the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Qu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;bec won the Plateau d'or 2007 and was shortlisted at the 2007 Boulogne-Billancourt International Designer Contest._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** QUEBEC: $36.95 (pre-order) Asmodee Editions [ASM QUE01] Publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Anticipated Release Date: LATE OCT / EARLY NOV *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD
Ystari version.

Asmodee (ASM QUE01) The year is 1608, at the dawn of New France and the foundation of Quebec City. In this new game, you head a rich family seeking to build the historically rich and architecturally beautiful city of Quebec. You will have four centuries to build the most beautiful buildings while ensuring your legacy among the most influential families of the time. Relive history, meet larger-than-life historical figures and realize the grandeur of Quebec City!
Includes Hitchcock Essen bonus card. Played twice. I only ship to the UK, cost £5

Experienced eBay seller, new to BGG selling. Love games. Heavy item, 2.5 Kilos. Shipping: Registered Post Parcel: (Including 1.65 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 16.25 UK - 37.25 Europe - 43.25 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 43.25 Local pickup in Dublin. Payment (In order of preference) 1) Bank Transfer - BIC/IBAN (Ireland, UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe only) - Buyer pays transfer fees if any. (Free cross border BIC/IBAN bank transfers within EU countries as far as I know.) 2) PayPal - Select _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Send money to friends and family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; option to bypass paying fees altogether, no PayPal buyer protection by doing this but you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need it. (It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s always free to send money to friends and family when you use your PayPal Balance or Bank Account) If you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t do this for whatever reason then please add 5 percent of the total cost (Item + P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P) to cover fees. Or buyer pays fees as part of the normal PayPal process when paying for merchandise or services if you really want the payment protection. All my games are exactly as described and are usually posted next working day after payment is received. Any other issues will be swiftly resolved in a professional and courteous manner. Combined postage for multiple items where possible. Combined P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P can result in higher shipping costs than for a single item due to different postage weight brackets but 9 times out of 10 it should still be less than shipping the items separately. On some occasions, depending on the items, only slightly less. If the combined items weight is less than 2 Kilo, item(s) will most likely be sent in the Packet weight bracket. If items can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be split into smaller packets then anything over 2 Kilos is a Registered Parcel and the P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P costs are considerably higher, usually starting between €40 and €45 and increasing in price as the weight increases for various destinations outside Ireland. PM me for further details if required. All my games for sale come from a smoke and pet free environment. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Best of luck and enjoy if you buy.
